channel.title: Comments on: The 4400 Cancelled? WTF?
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: ????????
item.description: Who in the - would do that ? I mean come on thats like the coolest show ever
item.content:encoded:
Who in the – would do that ?
I mean come on thats like the coolest show ever

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Exactly, stop watching USA and tell them that's the reason no on is watching. The rest of their shows suck anyway.
item.content:encoded: Exactly, stop watching USA and tell them that’s the reason no on is watching. The rest of their shows suck anyway.

item.title: By: Bob
item.dc:creator: Bob
item.description: Boxes of trash are not going to get anyones attention either. You get their attention by taking away their money. Stop watching USA network, all their other shows suck anyways.
item.content:encoded: Boxes of trash are not going to get anyones attention either. You get their attention by taking away their money. Stop watching USA network, all their other shows suck anyways.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I don't think that sending USA a box of trash will open their hearts to any sort of dialogue. Until The 4400, I had forgotten there was a USA network and, now that it is canceled, it will go back to being forgotten. I guess they are cool with that.
item.content:encoded: I don’t think that sending USA a box of trash will open their hearts to any sort of dialogue. Until The 4400, I had forgotten there was a USA network and, now that it is canceled, it will go back to being forgotten. I guess they are cool with that.

item.title: By: angela
item.dc:creator: angela
item.description: I maybe spinning my wheels, but if anyone is listening... i have been all over the web and I can find nothing most resent about this obvious slap in the fACE, from the USA execs. the sad part of all of this is that those of us that are extremely disturbed by this abrupt cancellation will continue to fan the flames of the networks. So with no avail we will shout out with disgust at the indignity. But the networks will continue to see us as mindless drones that eat the shit they are shoveling in our troths. if the networks want to take away our steak and give us garbage. I say lets give them a dose of their own medicine. I campaign to you that we petition for people to sent a box with trash to the network, because sunflowers seed...come on, really? That's not going to get anyone's attention. There is no surprise, it's all been done before.
item.content:encoded:
I maybe spinning my wheels, but if anyone is listening…
i have been all over the web and I can find nothing most resent about this obvious slap in the fACE, from the USA execs. the sad part of all of this is that those of us that are extremely disturbed by this abrupt cancellation will continue to fan the flames of the networks. So with no avail we will shout out with disgust at the indignity. But the networks will continue to see us as mindless drones that eat the shit they are shoveling in our troths. if the networks want to take away our steak and give us garbage. I say lets give them a dose of their own medicine. I campaign to you that we petition for people to sent a box with trash to the network, because sunflowers seed…come on, really? That’s not going to get anyone’s attention. There is no surprise, it’s all been done before.

item.title: By: Victor
item.dc:creator: Victor
item.description:
Oh come on..why is it that any show with just a hint of ceberal activity from it's creator is canceled.
Where is this peririon to sign
item.content:encoded:
Oh come on..why is it that any show with just a hint of ceberal activity from it’s creator is canceled.

Where is this peririon to sign

item.title: By: D
item.dc:creator: D
item.description: Thats 4 sure, really like to know how to get thru to sci fi. That the 4400 and the DeadZone are shows that should keep going . But its all about the anti Christ taking over the air waves anything that half resembles anything powerful and life changing gets booted for candy floss and dixie chicks drinking out of sex in the city cups filled with rubbing alcohol. What the masses resembles somewhere between mediocrity and not believeing a devil exists , little lone knowing there is a God out there.
item.content:encoded: Thats 4 sure, really like to know how to get thru to sci fi. That the 4400 and the DeadZone are shows that should keep going . But its all about the anti Christ taking over the air waves anything that half resembles anything powerful and life changing gets booted for candy floss and dixie chicks drinking out of sex in the city cups filled with rubbing alcohol. What the masses resembles somewhere between mediocrity and not believeing a devil exists , little lone knowing there is a God out there.

item.title: By: Nicole Langley
item.dc:creator: Nicole Langley
item.description: I love 4400...bring it back NOW...I also was able to get numerous other people hooked to the show...this is BS.
item.content:encoded: I love 4400…bring it back NOW…I also was able to get numerous other people hooked to the show…this is BS.

item.title: By: Ted Whitten
item.dc:creator: Ted Whitten
item.description: Bring The 4400 back! It was the best show on television! I miss it!
item.content:encoded: Bring The 4400 back! It was the best show on television! I miss it!

item.title: By: Jenny
item.dc:creator: Jenny
item.description: I saw every single episode. Once again, I will have to go back to the channel guide and find something else to watch for a season or two. Something is wrong with a world where friends runs for 11 seasons and 4400 gets canceled.
item.content:encoded: I saw every single episode. Once again, I will have to go back to the channel guide and find something else to watch for a season or two. Something is wrong with a world where friends runs for 11 seasons and 4400 gets canceled.
